list_definition.definition: a kind of tube containing lenses through which distant objects appear closer

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He looked at the ship through his telescope.

list_definition.definition: to push or be pushed together so that one part slides inside another, like the parts of a closing telescope

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The crash telescoped the railway coaches.
